name: Future Step
description:
Hello! I'm from Russia, and this is my first Jam!

I am studying to be a Cook, but I am very interested in game programming. It will be interesting what you say about my game.

Game play:

You play as a cube and have to go through the maze. You prepare the cube where you need to go and it performs your actions.

Management:

Teaching the cube to walk - W,A,S,D;

We tell the cube that it's time to go - Enter;

Restart the level and tell the cube to forget everything - R.

That's it! The game is written in C++ SFML.

Ju your ratings! :)

update (29.05.2022 - 19:23) :

-  Fixed a bug with the appearance of the cube all start zone
